citations.narrative:
***A contingency plan has not been developed for the facility. A plan for the management and care of the animals in the
event of an emergency or disaster must be developed, documented and maintained as required in Section 2.134 of the
Animal Welfare Regulations. Correct by April 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
***A contingency plan has not been developed for the facility.  A plan for the management and care of the animals in the 
event of an emergency or disaster must be developed, documented and maintained as required in Section 2.134 of the 
Animal Welfare Regulations.  Correct by April 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee. 
 
 n
